parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: The depth of children to retrieve. Set 0 for only the root categories, -1 for flat array, leave empty for the full tree

get.description: Gets a category. Use depth query to control the level of children to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the category to get

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: The depth of children to retrieve. Set 0 for only the requested category, leave empty for the full tree

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: Deletes the children subcategories. Default to false.

info.title: Nima CMS
info.description: The core api for the Nima CMS backend.
